Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Cost Description
1 Toxic Debris 32 Scatters Toxic Spikes on the opposing side when it takes damage from physical moves.
10 Poison Touch 15 May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
25 Marvel Scale 3 The Pokémon's marvelous scales boost the Defense stat if it has a status condition.
40 Sturdy 16 It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
55 Skill Link 32 Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.
70 Arena Lock 11 Negates statuses that affect the whole field.
85 Corrosion 2 The Pokémon can poison the target even if it's a Steel or Poison type.
100 Prism Armor 36 Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Cost Description
Disc 01 Battle Armor 60 Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
Disc 12 Sturdy 16 It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
Disc 27 Sludge Rush 38 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat on Noxious Terrain.
Disc 45 Sand Veil 3 Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in a sandstorm.
Disc 53 Arena Lock 11 Negates statuses that affect the whole field.
Disc 58 Prism Armor 36 Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Cost Description
Adaptability 77 Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.
Arena Trap 68 Prevents opposing Pokémon from fleeing.
Cecity -20 This Pokémon's poor eyesight makes its moves more likely to miss.
Corrosion 2 The Pokémon can poison the target even if it's a Steel or Poison type.
Forewarn 1 When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can tell one of the moves an opposing Pokémon has.
Guts 76 It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.
Marvel Scale 3 The Pokémon's marvelous scales boost the Defense stat if it has a status condition.
Merciless 66 The Pokémon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.
Poison Point 12 Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.
Poison Touch 15 May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
Sand Spit 46 The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it's hit by an attack.
Serene Grace 64 Boosts the likelihood of additional effects occurring when attacking.
Sheer Force 80 Removes additional effects to increase the power of moves when attacking.
Shell Armor 50 A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
Skill Link 32 Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.
Stench 11 By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
Tinted Lens 32 The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.
Toxic Debris 32 Scatters Toxic Spikes on the opposing side when it takes damage from physical moves.
Truant -67 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Unstable Isotope 31 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats under Gravity.
Weak Bones -1 Halves the Pokémon's Defense stat.
Noxious Surge 84 Turns the ground into Noxious Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
